description: Certain strings in the uri_query field when combined with null referer and null user agent can indicate activity associated with the webshell ReGeorg.
author: Cian Heasley
false_positives: Web applications that use the same URL parameters as ReGeorg
name: Webshell ReGeorg Detection Via Web Logs
query: (cs-uri-query:(*cmd\=read* OR *connect&target* OR *cmd\=connect* OR *cmd\=disconnect* OR *cmd\=forward*) AND NOT _exists_:cs-referer AND NOT _exists_:cs-user-agent AND http.request.method:"POST")
